pourquoiUtiliser: Why use this email signature generator?
paragrapheSimpleEfficace: This generator allows you to create a professional email signature in just a few clicks, with no registration or hassle. All fields are customizable and the preview updates instantly.
paragrapheOpenSource: This project is fully open source. You can view the code, contribute to its improvement, or adapt it to your own needs.
paragrapheGratuit: No cookies, no trackers, no ads. Just a tool designed to make your life easier.
quiEstDev: Who developed this email signature generator?
